name: Growth of cities - Bairoch (1988)
title: Growth of cities - Bairoch (1988)
description: See Table 8.2 (pp. 137), Table 13.5 (pp. 225), Table 26.1 (pp. 414), Table 26.3 (pp. 423), and Table 27.4 (pp. 438) for original data.

sources.name: Bairoch (1988)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Bairoch, P., 1988. Cities and Economic Development, translated by Christopher Braider.
sources.additionalInfo: See Table 8.2 (pp. 137), Table 13.5 (pp. 225), Table 26.1 (pp. 414), Table 26.3 (pp. 423), and Table 27.4 (pp. 438) for original data.

fields.name: Number of European cities (Bairoch (1988))
fields.description: Number of European cities, by the population size of the city (in 000s).

fields.name: Europe urban population share (Bairoch (1988))
fields.description: The percentage of the population classified as urban. A criterion of 5000 inhabitants is used for urban population.
